en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Xian

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Xian from tomorrow (April 22) to April 24 to attend the conference on mutual legal assistance on civil and commercial matters between the Mainland and the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR) co-organised by the Supreme People's Court (SPC) and the Department of Justice.

The theme of the conference is to review the development of mutual legal assistance on civil and commercial matters between the Mainland and the HKSAR in the past 20 years and to explore the way forward. Mr Yuen will deliver a speech at the opening ceremony of the event.

The conference will address issues including the mutual legal assistance on recognition and enforcement of arbitral awards and judgments in civil and commercial matters between the two jurisdictions, as well as the mutual legal assistance on service of judicial documents and taking of evidence in civil and commercial matters.

During his stay in Xian, Mr Yuen will meet with the Executive Vice President of the SPC, Mr Shen Deyong, and other officials to exchange views on matters of mutual interest and to visit court facilities.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the afternoon of April 24.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（四月二十二日）至二十四日訪問西安，出席由最高人民法院和律政司合辦的「內地與香港民商事司法協助二十周年回顧與展望專題研討會」。
研討會的主題為回顧過去二十年兩地民商事司法協助的發展，並探討未來的發展方向。袁國強將在研討會開幕式上致辭。
研討會討論的議題，包括兩地仲裁裁決和民商事案件判決認可與執行的司法協助，以及民商事案件相互委託送達司法文書和提取證據的司法協助。
訪問西安期間，袁國強將與最高人民法院常務副院長沈德咏及其他官員會面，就雙方關注的議題交換意見，並會參觀法院設施。
袁國強將於四月二十四日下午返港。
